```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Set output options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '-')

# Include libraries
library(uwIntroStats)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Helper functions


# Prepare data
mri <-
  read.table("data/mri.txt", header = TRUE) %>%
  dplyr::as_tibble() %>%
  dplyr::select(age, crt, obstime, death) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(crt)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(surv_5yr = dplyr::if_else(obstime >= 5 * 365.25, 1L, 0L))

```
